summary: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

Keane|Megan Gale|Josiah D. Lee|Eddie Vee|Peni Loloa|Alex Lorre|Harrison Norris|Chris Olver
keywords: aircraft cockpit|missile attack|captain|lieutenant|vertical take off and landing aircraft
title: La amenaza invisible. Stealth
